医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
ECG测试和AI可以检测到过早衰老和认知能力下降根据一项在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上进行的初步研究，有一天可以将心电图测试与人工智能（AI）模型一起使用，以检测过早的老化和认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/premature-aging-anging-and-cognitive-decline-decline-decline-could-be-be-detected-by-ecg-tests-and-ai.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/premature-aging-anging-and-cognitive-decline-decline-decline-could-be-be-be-detected-by-ecg-tests-and-ai.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10A8D913-45AC-4597-947E-350A0DEAA794 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 11:01:58 -0500 Premature aging and cognitive decline could be detected by ECG tests and AI
地中海饮食与西班牙裔/拉丁美洲人的改善大脑健康有关在地中海饮食中紧密相关的是，西班牙裔/拉丁裔成年人的大脑健康相关，这是在2025年美国中风协会的国际中风会议上进行的初步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/mediterranean-diet-linked-to-better-brain-health-health-health-in-hispaniclatino-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/mediterranean-diet-linked-to-better-brain-health-health-histhin-hispaniclino-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4ad7aa6-bcd4-462e-a5b0-b2309a22873b Thu, 30 Jan 2025 10:37:13 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to better brain health in Hispanic/Latino adults
快速且速度同样有效地提示911呼叫中风在促使人们以中风的第一个迹象打电话给911时，快速和快速的中风警告信号都同样有效。然而，人们通过快速的缩写词更好地记得，在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上提出的一项初步研究，人们对快速缩写的关键警告信号（面部，手臂和言语）更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/fast-and-be-be-fast-equally-equally-equalctive-in-prompting-911-calls-for-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/fast-and-be-fast-equast-equally-efferce--in-prompting-911-calls-for-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f06Edd4-2577-4705-aa14-556e72e3fea7 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 10:34:13 -0500 F.A.S.T. and BE-FAST equally effective in prompting 911 calls for stroke
较高的强度步行计划可以提高中风幸存者的流动性根据在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上进行的一项初步研究，一项逐渐更高强度的步行锻炼计划与标准物理疗法相结合，显着改善了中风幸存者的生活质量和流动性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/higher-intensited-walking-program-boosts-mobility-in-stroke-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/higher-intensity-walking-program-boosts-mobility-instroke-stroke-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=D2B87F40-9828-4885-9E50-BF7BF7B1992110C Thu, 30 Jan 2025 09:20:13 -0500 Higher intensity walking program boosts mobility in stroke survivors
快速血液测试可以鉴定凝块引起的中风的脑出血根据在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上进行的一项初步研究，血液检查可能会迅速将脑出血与凝块引起的中风区分开。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/rapid-blood-test-test-could-indify-brain-bleeds-from-clot-clot-caused-caused-strokes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/rapid-blood-test-test-could-indify-sideify-brain-bleeds-from-clot-clot-caused-caused-strokes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=297E0BC6-7B1C-47F2-B0D1-B0D1-3C7E73B355A8 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 09:17:43 -0500 Rapid blood test could identify brain bleeds from clot-caused strokes
中风患者的口服和肠道细菌与预后和死亡率较差有关根据一项在美国卒中的初步研究，通常在口腔和胃肠道中发现的一种普通细菌，链球菌肾上腺炎，链球菌肾上腺炎可能很丰富，并且与预后较差和死亡风险增加有关。协会的国际中风会议2025。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/oral-and-gut-bacteria-bacteria-in-sstroke-patients-patients-patients-patient-with-with-with-with-worse-prognosis-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/oral-and-gut-bacteria-bacteria-in-sstroke-patients-patients-patients-massiate-with-with-with-with-worse-prognosis-prognosis-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e1668987-ce2c-4A18-A027-D3974BE24085 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:45:06 -0500 Oral and gut bacteria in stroke patients associated with worse prognosis and mortality
较短的端粒与年龄有关的脑部疾病风险更高染色体结束时具有较短保护帽的人（称为端粒）可能更有可能患上与年龄相关的脑部疾病，例如中风，痴呆症和晚期抑郁症（通常在60岁或以上诊断出）。研究将在2025年美国中风协会的国际中风会议上进行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/shorter-telomeres-linked-to-higher-to-higher-risk-of-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-brain-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/shorter-telomeres-linked-to-higher-risk-risk-risk-oge-gage-age-age-age-age-age-age-age-brain-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d65786e-3004-46bb-ad31-fa55555555555555555555555BF24061 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:39:01 -0500 Shorter telomeres linked to higher risk of age-related brain diseases
干细胞来源的心脏补丁显示出心力衰竭治疗的希望源自干细胞的创新肌肉斑块表现出心脏修复的功效，提高灵长类动物和人类患者的功能，并进行了试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/stem-cell-derive--derive-der-der-patches-show-promise-promise-for for-heart-failure-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/stem-cell-derives-hend-patches-patches-show-promise-promise-for for-heart-failure-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b08d253-ce2e-401a-bab7-b0208d295ca0 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:05:00 -0500 Stem cell-derived heart patches show promise for heart failure treatment
常规牙线牙线与降低中风和不规则心跳的风险有关根据在美国中风协会的2025年国际中风会议上提出的一项初步研究，每周至少每周至少每周一次牙齿可能与血凝块阻断脑血流和不规则心跳的较低的中风风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/regular-dental-flossing-link-to-link-to-lower-to-lower-risk-of-sstroke-of-sstroke-and-irregular-hardtbeats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/regular-dental-flossing-link----------------------------------------------------------------------- and-irregular-heardbeats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c68abee-54A4A4-4EF6-985F-6CBA4D8B1022 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 08:00:15 -0500 Regular dental flossing linked to lower risk of stroke and irregular heartbeats
特朗普政府停止了CDC每周科学报告停滞鸟流感研究特朗普政府已经介入了有关鸟流感的重要研究，随着爆发在美国的爆发升级。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/trump-administratione28099s-halt-of-cdce28099s-weekly-scientific-scientific-scientific-scientific-scientific-reports-ports-bird-bird-bird-flu-flu-cudies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/trump-administratione28099s-halt-halt-of-cdce28099s-weekly-scientific-scientific-scientific-scientific-scientific-scientific-report-stalls-bird-bird bird-flu-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85619b79b79-1f6f-41A5-AD5D-7EA4FCBD840B Thu, 30 Jan 2025 07:09:32 -0500 Trump administration’s halt of CDC’s weekly scientific report stalls bird flu studies
